mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) num ,a.user_id,b.username,sum(c.sign_amount_price) amount_price FROM `offer_buy` a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.user_id=b.user_id left join sign_info c on a.id=c.offer_buy_id where a.project_id=#{projectId} and a.status=1 GROUP BY a.user_id,b.username ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 0,10
select count(1) from offer_buy where project_id=#{projectId} and status=#{status}
